program_name: USA Swimming Find A Team & Lessons
notes: USA Swimming parent page points to a provider search page for lessons and teams.
Search form accepts school name plus address, city, or zip.
Locator supports search by zip code or exact address.
Promotes a location finder for SwimAmerica programs.
Chapter swim lessons page, includes group and private options.
Private in-home lessons listing page for Honolulu.
Example instructor listing with phone and email.

program_name: How to add resources to the directory dataset
notes: To add more resources: open the Google Sheet, go to the swim_lessons tab, add a new row with values for each column (provider_name, program_name, provider_type, cost_type, ages, address, city, state, zip, phone, email, website, source_url, notes, status). Set status to approved for the row to appear on the site. GitHub Actions runs daily at 3:17 AM UTC, or trigger manually from the Actions tab. Rows without status=approved are filtered out, use draft or pending to stage entries.
